definition: to try out a new product (or manufacturing process)/prototype/trial product
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: The optimized sample of the aerator has been trial-produced and tested under the water.
sentences.chinese: 最后对优化后的曝气机样机进行试制和下水试验。

sentences.english: The technological chain of producing heat-resistant porcelain with the local ban-cite was narrated in particular.
sentences.chinese: 主要叙述采用本地红墙石试制耐热瓷的工艺过程。

sentences.english: The new and trial-manufactured silencer excelled the silencer of original machine on each item of performances.
sentences.chinese: 新试制的消声器各项性能均优于原机消声器。

sentences.english: Article 2 The system of uniform national examination shall be applied to the qualification examination on customs declarers .
sentences.chinese: 第二条报关员资格考试实行全国统一考试制度。

sentences.english: The new and trial-manufactured piston excelled the piston of original machine on each item of performances.
sentences.chinese: 新试制的活塞各项性能均优于原机活塞。

sentences.english: It is a new kind of concrete reinforcing product which is made of PP material.
sentences.chinese: 就是有天大的困难，我们也要把这种产品试制成功。

sentences.english: The article introduces trial-manufacture of grouting steel-edged rubber water stop and its application.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了可注浆式钢边橡胶止水带的试制及应用情况。

sentences.english: A number of new products have been successfully trial-produced. ?
sentences.chinese: 许多新产品已试制成功。

sentences.english: The fundamental research and industry trials of the3rd generation automobile steels was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了第3代汽车钢的基础研究与工业试制工作。

sentences.english: System of exam of our country officeholder from what when begin ?
sentences.chinese: 我国公务员考试制度从什么时候开始的？

sentences.english: To trial-produce this product, we need some costly materials.
sentences.chinese: 为试制这种产品，我们需要某些价值昂贵的材料。

sentences.english: The development process and result of the ADI crankshaft for a turbocharged 6 cylinders diesel engine was described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍六缸增压柴油机等淬球铁曲轴的试制过程及结果。

sentences.english: This paper describes the development of a microelectrolytic water sterilizer and its structure.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了微电解杀菌器的试制和其构造组成。

sentences.english: Improved design of the old instrument shaft, made success through one trial-manufacture.
sentences.chinese: 改进了仪表传动轴原设计，一次试制成功。

sentences.english: Having been trial-produced several times this new product will be put into mass production.
sentences.chinese: 这种新产品经过几次试制，将投入成批生产。

sentences.english: Chinese examination system sometimes is full of controversy.
sentences.chinese: 有时候中国的考试制度是有争议的。

definition: to copy/to imitate/to make by imitating a model
to stamp/to press (sheet metal)/Taiwan pr. [chong1 ya1]
to produce/to manufacture/to give birth to a child
to put sth on the market
to storm a strategic pass/fig. to tackle a key problem
to copy/to produce sth after a model/to counterfeit
